file(COPY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/Win64/vld.lib" DESTINATION  "${PROJECT_LIBS_DIR}/Debug")
file(COPY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/Win64/vld.pdb" DESTINATION  "${PROJECT_OUTPUT_DIR}/Debug")
file(COPY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/Win64/vld.dll" DESTINATION  "${PROJECT_OUTPUT_DIR}/Debug")
file(COPY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bin/Win64/dbghelp.dll" DESTINATION  "${PROJECT_OUTPUT_DIR}/Debug")
file(COPY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vld.ini" DESTINATION  "${PROJECT_OUTPUT_DIR}/Debug")
